tweets.text: In the @AffinityWater application locations of the pumping stations were redacted. The @EnvAgency excuse ‚Äúcould compromise the security of public water supply assets‚Äù so building two HS2 tunnels through the aquifer does not compromise the security of public water supply??

@EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @antheaturner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas 

The annoyance level for hydrogen sulphide (h2s) is 7 ugm3. 

Would anyone at the EA like to comment on why we are seeing figures as high as 1017 ugm3. 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/G4jobNaxsi

Iv been so poorly. Antibiotics & steroids for me! GP says i have pleurisy & he suspects its the result of being gassed out by landfill gas H2S in my own home, especially last Thursday! @ClareDinnisEA where is the @EnvAgency urgency in resolving this #StopTheStink  @AaronBell4NUL

@Kimble8313 @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @MattHancock Is this the new normal ?
#stopthestink caused by Walleys Quarry Ltd previously known as @redindustries2 https://t.co/5PqPvbjfC2

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids you currently assess H2S from against annoyance (30 min avg 7ug/m3) and health (24hr avg 150ug/m3), what are the effects of several hundred ug/m3 for 12 hours day after day? This is our nightly reality. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL

The local BID is urging traders to log any issues or customer complaints about the smell coming from Walleys Quarry
https://t.co/PzFwZvQ6Qd

DReadful night across NUL What do you allow to happen at the Hell Hole at weekends @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids Your HotLine was burning last night. Shame on You. De @ClareDinnisEA this the Nat Incident it is #StopTheStink @JuliaBradbury @ShaunLintern @JournoJess_ @DrMariaNeira

If lack of resources are stopping @EnvAgency sorting out Walleys Quarry, are the govt looking at providing a lump sum to get it sorted and avert a mass public health disaster? Remember, we elected you @RishiSunak @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock

urls.description: The work will be carried out by Kier, with Arup involved in devising the detailed designs for repair plan. On 1 August 2019, a single slab of the dam‚Äôs

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @EnvAgency By definition, if it is not behaving how you expect, then you have no understanding how to control it, thus the landfill is out of control. When Toddbrook Dam Spillway was out of control, ¬£12M of funding was ‚Äúfound‚Äù to bring it back under control (https://t.co/OKNziVWCTo)

The Affinity abstraction application required public consultation, the @EnvAgency did their best to hide this, in their consultation advert no mention of HS2. Despite the EAs best efforts fortunately the public did find this notice and asked some searching questions.

What's going on when residents are up half the night with burning eyes, nose and throats on a regular basis and no one seems to have the power to stop it? The truth will out one day. Let's hope soon #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @MattHancock

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids How about stopping operations until they are compliant at the very least? Your allowing a company to accept further waste onto a site which has been found in breach of 10 regulations and all they‚Äôve been seen to of done is hire a Relations Manager... How can you justify this?

Part of the EA's ¬£35m Keadby Pumping Station Renewal is to update the outfall structure. Neither the chap in the photo nor the concrete has aged since the original 30s construction. There's a bit more safety gear needed now though! #Keadby @EnvAgencyMids @gallifordtry https://t.co/vXoXPDRJSA

Horses are wonderful animals. Majestic and trustworthy animals. 

Contrast this with Walleys Quarry Landfill run by @RedIndustries2 who simply don‚Äôt care.  

They poison a town and don‚Äôt care if it‚Äôs people or horses.  

Come on @EnvAgencyMids get the whip and sort it. https://t.co/JqHHm7JFqa
@tayz_BETH @WHO @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JuliaBradbury @DrMariaNeira @ShaunLintern @JournoJess_ @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe That‚Äôs appalling.

urls.title: Petition: Give the Environment Agency the funds and freedom to protect English rivers
urls.description: The Government must reverse years of cuts to Agency budgets, increase charges for polluters, and give the Agency freedom from overly business-friendly Government codes and guidance, so it can pursue and achieve its principal statutory objective to protect and enhance English rivers

urls.title: PROJECT UPDATE - Water vole release confirmed!
urls.description: Spring 2022 release date confirmed Last Wednesday was a huge day for our Get InVOLEd project, as we had rewilding expert and consultant Derek Gow down to assess the Hogsmill River along with representatives from Southeast Rivers Trust, Thames Water, the Environment Agency and Kingston Council. The primary discussions were

tweets.text: We are delighted to announce our Spring release date for #watervoles has been confirmed for 2022. Thanks to @gow_derek @EnvAgency @thameswater @SE_Rivers_Trust @RBKingston for visiting the Hogmsill to discuss the feasibility of the project. Read more: https://t.co/GJzGTXsuRI https://t.co/3LqR8HygWl

@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @pow_rebecca @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EmmaHowardBoyd @AaronBell4NUL
